flavor: You were born in the waning town of Kiris Dahn and spent your early years there. The citizens abandoned the already dilapidated town eight years ago, but you remember how it once was. Was your family wealthy or poor? Did you know about the townâ€™s magical defenses? Have you seen the town since it was overrun and renamed Gorizbadd?
name: Citizen Of Kiris Dahn
